name: Ant Attack (itch) (Fade)
description:
Unleash your bullets upon waves of angry ants trying to steal your food!

Start with a pile of food, the ants will spawn and try to run away with your food.

Run out of food and you lose the game.

The game is endless and you are playing for a high score! There is no way to win.

Controls:

Mouse - Rotate Tower

Left click - Shoot

Powerups:

Powerups spawn every now and then from the sky, shoot the crates to activate them.

Food Powerup - Spawns more food to your pile

Bomb Powerup - Spawns an explosive landmine

Ants:

Regular Ant - Average speed, carries 1 food

Twin Ant - Faster, waits for another twin ant, carries 1 food combined

Fire Ant - Slower, takes more damage, carries 2 food

Waves of ants get increasingly harder and begin to spawn quicker over time!
